metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5823 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: WebKit, as used in JavaScriptCore in Apple iOS before 9 and iTunes before12.3, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denialof service (memory corruption and application crash) via a crafted website, a different vulnerability than other WebKit CVEs listed inAPPLE-SA-2015-09-16-1 and APPLE-SA-2015-09-16-3.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
